entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 35 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 48. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 08:44 AM EST Monday 06 February 2023
